wikipedia_page.main:
Capt. David McLaren Bain (10 September 1891 – 3 June 1915) was a Scotland rugby union player.
Bain was born in Edinburgh, to William Bain and Edith Frederika McLaren Bain. He played for Oxford University RFC and was capped for Scotland in 1911–14. Bain had captained Scotland against Wales in 1914.He was killed in France in World War I, while serving with the Gordon Highlanders.
